item.title: I Know Where You Took Your Pictures Last Summer
item.description:
Eye-Fi, the WiFi-enabled memory card, has introduced a new feature: location tagging. Their latest product, Eye-Fi Explore, automatically adds geotags to photos as you take them. You might be surprised to learn that they haven’t actually included a GPS receiver in the small SD card. Instead, it uses a system that determines location based on known WiFi hotspots. This method covers a significant portion of the U.S. population and major metropolitan areas in Europe...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/i-know-where-you-took-your-pictures-last-summer/

item.title: The Someline Apple Tree app will produce apples for charity as long as you refrain from using your phone
item.description:
Source: Google Play. Libern Lin, a student entrepreneur attending Republic Polytechnic in Singapore, has expanded his app, Someline Apple Tree, with financial support from the Singapore Computer Society (SCS). The app incentivizes real-life interactions by rewarding users with digital apples for reducing phone usage. Lin, the app’s creator, explained that they wanted to use the app’s concept for a good cause. So, they used the S$30,000 grant from SCS to add a charitable component to the app in line with IDA’s Code for Charity*...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-someline-apple-tree-app-will-produce-apples-for-charity-as-long-as-you-refrain-from-using-your-phone/

item.title: Kickstarter's main focus is on recording directly from your phone to the computer
item.description:
Recap S2, a compact device designed to connect to smartphones for saving calls to external devices like computers or voice recorders, is seeking funding on Kickstarter. Source: Kickstarter website Inventor Igor Ramos highlights the device’s user-friendliness, stating its compatibility with any device equipped with a combo port for input and a standard stereo microphone port for output. Ramos assures users that Recap recordings maintain the original call quality. A video demonstration is available here...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/kickstarter-s-main-focus-is-on-recording-directly-from-your-phone-to-the-computer/

item.title: G.ho.st as the Machine
item.description:
If you come across a platform called G.ho.st, don’t be spooked by the name. It stands for Global Hosted Operating SysTem, found at http://g.ho.st/. It’s essentially an online operating system. Instead of being restricted to your desktop, G.ho.st allows you to access an operating system anywhere with an internet connection. I decided to try it out myself. The website was visually appealing, so I launched the G.ho.st virtual computer (VC). Unfortunately, my old Compaq couldn’t handle it and displayed an error message...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ghost-as-the-machine/

item.title: Local computer vendor in Singapore raided by police, counterfeit Microsoft software discovered
item.description:
Microsoft is urging consumers and small businesses to be cautious when buying software, warning them about the risks of accidentally purchasing and using counterfeit products. This advisory comes after a recent raid on a computer vendor in Kembangan Plaza by the Intellectual Property Rights Branch (IPRB) of the Singapore Police Force. The shop in question had been advertising unauthorized “Microsoft license keys” as genuine and offering computers bundled with counterfeit software at heavily discounted prices through their online store...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/local-computer-vendor-in-singapore-raided-by-police-counterfeit-microsoft-software-discovered/

item.title: Apple introduces the iMac featuring the Retina 5K display, the most advanced display resolution to date
item.description:
Forget 4K, Apple has jumped ahead with 5K resolution. Source: Apple. Apple introduces the 27-inch iMac with a Retina 5K display, boasting the world’s highest resolution display with 14.7 million pixels. This advancement results in sharper text, more realistic videos, and an unprecedented level of detail in photographs. “Thirty years after the first Mac revolutionized technology, the new iMac with Retina 5K display and OS X Yosemite is the most impressive Mac we’ve created,” said Philip Schiller, Apple’s Senior VP of Worldwide Marketing...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/apple-introduces-the-imac-featuring-the-retina-5k-display-the-most-advanced-display-resolution-to-date/
